name: Sierra Luxury Room | 2 Queen
description: Luxury dual queen room in the Sierra Tower featuring premium furnishings, two queen-size beds, accommodating up to four guests. Includes High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee.
shortDescription: Premium luxury dual queen room in the Sierra Tower for up to four guests.

meta.title: Sierra Luxury Room 2 Queen – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Sierra Luxury Room with two queens at Eldorado Resort Reno – premium accommodations for up to four guests.

testimonials.quote: Sierra Luxury Room | 2 Queen was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Amanda G.

testimonials.quote: Visited Sierra Luxury Room | 2 Queen during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Kevin G.
